items.sentence: We'll have a better chance of surviving if we stay calm.
Mary and her husband are coming over for dinner tonight.
I don't know any girls who are more beautiful than Mary.
Tom has written the letter, but he hasn't mailed it yet.
I have more information that you might be interested in.
I don't think that Tom knows that Mary doesn't like him.
I don't think that Tom knows what Mary bought yesterday.
Tom didn't tell us anything that we didn't already know.
Tom plays the harmonica better than he plays the guitar.
We spent all day looking for the keys that Tom had lost.
That's the most important question to consider, I think.
Tom says he and Mary will spend New Year's Eve together.
Tom needs to make a list of things that need to be done.
The more you explain it, the more I don't understand it.
In order to stay awake, I may have to drink more coffee.
If it weren't for the sun, every living thing would die.
We came pretty close to being involved in that accident.
I've written down some questions that I'd like answered.
I want to thank Tom for inviting me to give this speech.
Tom was convinced he'd be happier if he moved to Boston.
